content.question: Which of the following strategies will best help to protect mangrove habitats?

choices.label: Limiting coastal development and maintain a shoreline buffer zone
Increasing aquaculture operations to reduce overfishing
Increasing subsidies for hydroelectric dam construction
Encouraging land use changes in areas surrounding mangroves to shift to agriculture

content.answer: Limiting coastal development and maintain a shoreline buffer zone

topic.text: 8.4: Human Impacts on Wetlands and Mangroves
